Pre-Game Insights: Senegal possesses the quality to clinch a narrow victory.
Guinea have remained unbeaten in their past 3 games.
Senegal are unbeaten in their past 6 games in all competitions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Guinea will face the absence of their captain, Francois Kamano, who received a straight red card in the 1-1 draw against Cameroon in the initial game.
Senegal may continue to be without defender Moussa Niakhite, who missed the second game due to an injury sustained in the first.
Nicolas Jackson may earn his first tournament start in the forward position, and veteran Idrissa Gueye could be included in the starting XI to compensate for the team’s injuries.
